original_text: But I would not listen to Balaam, so he blessed you again and again, and I delivered you out of his hand.
korean_text: 내가 발람을 위해 듣기를 원하지 아니하였으므로 그가 오히려 너희를 축복하였고 나는 너희를 그의 손에서 건져내었으며

sentences.original_text: But I would not listen to Balaam
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 발람의 말을 듣지 않았으니

sentences.original_text: so he blessed you again and again
and I delivered you out of his hand
